divs: Sighting DetailsSitting watching tv with children approx 830-9p.m 3-1-13 daughter saw the red lights in the trees north of the house. Rest of family saw the lights. Husband went onto porchto see if he could hear anything, no sound. Lights looked as if they were falling but very slowly. husband thought its light pattern could be a plane (T shaped).. Lights then disappeared. Children said they thought it was stars since some are red.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Starks
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Red lights to north of home noticed by daughter
